MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Coedpoeth and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.28PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.11PM on 8th November 2020
